PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
At the end of your turn take #ydamage equal to the stacks of this affect and remove all stacks.
Add #b1 to the #yDamage and #yBlock of this card. NL When you play this card gain #b1 #yBarbed. NL When #yDrawn infect all adjacent cards with this affect.
